# awesome-view-break



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Slots

| Slot    | Description                                |
| ------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| `"lg"`  | Content is displayed for _lg_ breakpoint.  |
| `"md"`  | Content is displayed for _md_ breakpoint.  |
| `"sm"`  | Content is displayed for _sm_ breakpoint.  |
| `"xl"`  | Content is displayed for _xl_ breakpoint.  |
| `"xs"`  | Content is displayed for _xs_ breakpoint.  |
| `"xxl"` | Content is displayed for _xxl_ breakpoint. |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name            | Description                                  |
| --------------- | -------------------------------------------- |
| `--awesome-lg`  | The view breakpoint for lg. (Default: 960)   |
| `--awesome-md`  | The view breakpoint for md. (Default: 720)   |
| `--awesome-sm`  | The view breakpoint for sm. (Default: 540)   |
| `--awesome-xl`  | The view breakpoint for xl. (Default: 1140)  |
| `--awesome-xs`  | The view breakpoint for xs. (Default: 0)     |
| `--awesome-xxl` | The view breakpoint for xxl. (Default: 1320) |
